description.en: Requires student to fill in one or more blanks with a short text answer.
description.nl: Vraagt de student om een of meer lege plekken in te vullen met een kort tekstantwoord.

generation.instructions: Generate settings that look like this: {text: "The capital of France is ___ and the capital of Spain is ___", correctAnswer: ["Paris", "Madrid"]} - there needs to be at least one blank (___) in the text, and the correctAnswer array needs to have the same number of entries as there are blanks in the text. Only include the text with blanks in the `text` field in the settings. Do not add it to the description, and do not give away the correct answers other than in the `correctAnswer` field in the settings.

settings.name: The question text with blanks
settings.description: The text of the question (string), with blanks represented by ___

settings.name: Correct answer
settings.description: The correct answer(s) to the question, that represent the blanks. There needs to be the same number of entries as there are blanks in the text.

help.en: Use three underscores (___) to indicate a blank.
help.nl: Gebruik drie onderstrepingstekens (___) om een lege plek aan te geven.
